channel.title: SMF For Free - Making A Forum
channel.description: First off, I REALLY Love SMF For Free - Mopar's forum hosting is SMF For Free. The Support Forum Is http://www.smfsupport.com/support/ First you'll need to click [url=http://www.smfforfree2.com/free-forum.php] THIS LINK[/url], then lets start! First, you'll need to put in your forum name. Now you will need a url, its always http://FORUMURLYOUCHOOSE.smfforfree2.com incept without capitalizes. so if I put RScapersss it would be http://rscapersss.smfforfree2.com (I don't know if that's a forum =P) Next, the category! Put in the category it best suites. Now, you'll need your ADMIN username, your display name, mine is Eifel 65, It'll show you every time you post. Next, your password, always keep it safe, easy to remember for you, hard to guess for others. Now, below it says "Comfirm password" that means to retype your password so if you accidently typed it wrong. Your almost done with your forums! Now, your e-mail address. Very simple, just type in your email address. Then Comfirm it below. Now, it asks to recieve newsletters. I never really tried, but I think it tells you the updates. Now, the "Image Code" put it in. Heres how, you'll need to type in the code above, and put it in the box below it. Your done with your forum! Here's what it should look like: [URL=http://img338.imageshack.us/my.php?image=waheashpg8.png][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/3922/waheashpg8.th.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: SMF For Free - Making A Forum
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

Ugh guys, its simple. Mopar got some hosting. Brought a domain. Went to www.simplmachines.org and downloaded SMF. Hosted it. End of, he did not use smfforfree or smfhost.

P.S if your so bad at finding a host… Use Smfhost.com - less ads.

Read full topic
item.source: SMF For Free - Making A Forum

SMF is a type of forum software like phpBB and vBulliten but is free. all you need is a place where you can upload files and upload the forum files

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

littlesoul:

Well then mopar would be getting dun for copy rite, because this is the smffor free forum yes they use smf for free and they just use moparisthebest.com as a nother address and yes they pay for it they may have it running on there own computer not sure about there i wouldnt -.- … but it is an smf forum…

WOW. thats is like saying anyone who uses java should be sued because the poeple who coeded runescpae use it
SMF is not trade marked.
